definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive

pinyin: pian1 zheng4 shi4 he2 cheng2 ci2
jian4 li4 zheng4 shi4 wai4 jiao1 guan1 xi4

sentences.english: MKCCC and Good Shepherd Community Church agreed to co-operate on building project.
sentences.chinese: 美堅堂與善牧堂正式簽署建堂合作計劃。

sentences.english: He is due to be formally inaugurated in front of parliament on Wednesday.
sentences.chinese: 艾哈邁迪內賈德星期三將在伊朗議會上正式就任總統。

sentences.english: The downside is that you won't get a formal diagnosis nor prescription.
sentences.chinese: 不足之處是你無法得到正式的診斷書及處方。

sentences.english: The applicants who pass the qualification pre-evaluation will receive the formal invitation for Levy.
sentences.chinese: 主辦單位向資審合格的應徵人發出正式邀請。

sentences.english: Further features will be encorporated in the final version.
sentences.chinese: 正式版中還會有進一步改善。

sentences.english: Within the informal work method of RUP, this is often unnecessary.
sentences.chinese: 在RUP方法的正式工作中，這常常是不必要的。

sentences.english: The result is a very earthy, informal language.
sentences.chinese: 結果是一個非常樸實的，非正式的語言。

sentences.english: Remuneration will be give to the writers within one month after the article is officially published.
sentences.chinese: 文章稿酬在稿件正式發佈後一個月內發放。

sentences.english: Instead, they honored him, by adopting the breed as the official firehouse mascot.
sentences.chinese: 相反，他們尊敬它，用它來作爲消防隊的正式吉祥物。
春運於一月三十日正式開始。

sentences.english: With the formal suits but humorous gestures, the Chorale made their first appearance.
sentences.chinese: 正式的着裝，詼諧的動作，是該合唱團的出場秀。

sentences.english: It's been non-stop football for me since I started when I was 17.
sentences.chinese: 自從我17歲參加正式比賽以來還從未停過工。

sentences.english: An official tie, worn without tiepin.
sentences.chinese: 正式領帶且不戴領帶夾。

sentences.english: At intervals formal receptions were held at the governor's mansion.
sentences.chinese: 總督府中不時舉行正式酒會。

sentences.english: Yes, I was last year formal abdication comes down to run Hefei group to buy a network.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我是去年正式辭職下來運作合肥團購網的。

sentences.english: Preparatory classes (kachi, or nursery) were formally incorporated into the system in 1988.
sentences.chinese: 在1988年，學前預備班也正式加入了該體系中。

definition: on the eve of/to be about to/to be on the verge of
to continue/to follow after/to go on with/to succeed/to inherit/then/afterwards
government/official (approved or issued by an authority)
(fig.) to raise the curtain/to lift the curtain/to be a curtain raiser for
to start using/(computing) to enable (a feature)
